price: 9. Tokkel mayaaxiga innaa! seehadayti kaa qambaltam magooqat enni ittam Yalli yayyaaqu waa waqdi cisab kee galtoh?
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
